pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python SDK## Installation```bashpip install trinsic-sdkpython -m trinsic```Installs and verifies the installation. You should receive a consolemessage: `Package successfully installed. Sample profile below` and a long base64 string output. This base64 string isthe encoded `AccountProfile`. For more information, see the documentation link below## DocumentationSee [documentation here](https://docs.trinsic.id/)
